application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by conditions 3 (Materials), 5 (SudS), 6 (Landscaping), 7 (Fire Safety), 8 (Refuse) and 12 (Boundary Treatment) of permission 23/00687/FUL (Demolition of existing bungalow and erection of 2no. three-bedroomed semi-detached 2 storey houses with parking, cycle storage and recycling store) allowed under appeal APP/Z5630/W/23/3329837 dated 30.07.2024
decision_conditions: The applicant has submitted insufficient detail to demonstrate that the proposal would satisfy the requirements of condition 3 (Materials) of 23/00687/FUL.
The applicant has submitted insufficient detail to demonstrate that the proposal would satisfy the requirements of condition 5 (SuDS)  of 23/00687/FUL.
The applicant has submitted insufficient detail to demonstrate that the proposal would satisfy the requirements of condition 12 of 230/00687/FUL.
